Plots_boxplotb.purpose: Structure required as input by boxplotb

fields.name: ylim
fields.purpose: minimum and maximum on the y axis

fields.name: xlim
fields.purpose: minimum and maximum on the x axis

fields.name: InnerColor
fields.purpose: color in RGB format to fill the inner contour

fields.name: OuterColor
fields.purpose: color in RGB format to fill the inner contour

relSol.purpose: Structure required as input by carbikeplot

field.name: MIXMIXbs
field.purpose: details of the best solutions for MIXMIX

field.name: MIXMIXbsari
field.purpose: adjusted Rand indexes associated with the best solutions for MIXMIX

field.name: MIXCLAbs
field.purpose: details of the best solutions for MIXCLA

field.name: MIXCLAbsari
field.purpose: adjusted Rand indexes associated with the best solutions for MIXCLA

field.name: CLACLAbs
field.purpose: details of the best solutions for CLACLA

field.name: CLACLAbsari
field.purpose: adjusted Rand indexes associated with the best solutions for CLACLA

field.name: kk
field.purpose: vector containing the values of k which have been considered

field.name: cc
field.purpose: scalar or vector containing the values of c which have been considered

relSolGPCM.purpose: Structure required as input by carbikeplotGPCM

field.name: MIXMIXbs
field.purpose: details of the best solutions for MIXMIX

field.name: MIXMIXbsari
field.purpose: adjusted Rand indexes associated with the best solutions for MIXMIX

field.name: MIXCLAbs
field.purpose: details of the best solutions for MIXCLA

field.name: MIXCLAbsari
field.purpose: adjusted Rand indexes associated with the best solutions for MIXCLA

field.name: CLACLAbs
field.purpose: details of the best solutions for CLACLA

field.name: CLACLAbsari
field.purpose: adjusted Rand indexes associated with the best solutions for CLACLA

field.name: kk
field.purpose: vector containing the values of k which have been considered

field.name: ccdet
field.purpose: vector containing the values of cdet which have been considered

field.name: ccshw
field.purpose: vector containing the values of cshw which have been considered

field.name: alpha
field.purpose: scalar containing the value of alpha which has been considered.

Outms.purpose: Structure required as input by cdsplot

field.name: stor
field.purpose: k x 9 matrix containing statistics which are used to create the candles

field.name: outl
field.purpose: r x 4 matrix containing information about 'influential units' or empty matrix

field.name: siz
field.purpose: vector of length 2 containing information about n

PlotsCorAna.purpose: structure required as input by CorAnaplot

field.name: alpha
field.purpose: type of plot

field.name: FontSize
field.purpose: scalar which specifies font size of row (column) labels

field.name: FontSizeSup
field.purpose: scalar which specifies font size of row (column) labels of supplementary points

field.name: MarkerSize
field.purpose: scalar which specifies the marker size of symbols associated with rows or columns

field.name: SymbolRows
field.purpose: character which specifies the symbol to use for row points

field.name: SymbolCols
field.purpose: character which specifies the symbol to use for column points

field.name: SymbolRowsSup
field.purpose: character which specifies the symbol to use for supplementary row points

field.name: SymbolColsSup
field.purpose: character which specifies the symbol to use for supplementary column points

field.name: ColorRows
field.purpose: character which specifies the symbol to use for row points or RGB triplet

field.name: ColorMapLabelRows
field.purpose: character or cell which specifies whether the color of row labels must depend on a colormap

field.name: ColorCols
field.purpose: character which specifies the symbol to use for column points or RGB triplet

field.name: ColorMapLabelCols
field.purpose: character or cell which specifies  whether the color of column labels must depend on a colormap

field.name: ColorRowsSup
field.purpose: character which specifies the symbol to use for row points or RGB triplet

field.name: ColorColsSup
field.purpose: character which specifies the symbol to use for supplementary column points or RGB triplet

field.name: MarkerFaceColorRows
field.purpose: character which specifies the marker fill color to use for active row points or RGB triplet

field.name: MarkerFaceColorCols
field.purpose: character which specifies the marker fill color to use for active column points or RGB triplet

field.name: MarkerFaceColorRowsSup
field.purpose: character which specifies the marker fill color to use for supplementary row points or RGB triplet

field.name: MarkerFaceColorColsSup
field.purpose: character which specifies the marker fill color to use for supplementary column points or RGB triplet

ConfellipseCorAna.purpose: structure requested as optional input by CorAnaplot

field.name: conflev
field.purpose: confidence level of each ellipse

field.name: method
field.purpose: specifies the method(s) to use to compute confidence ellipses

field.name: nsimul
field.purpose: number of contingency tables which have to ge generated

field.name: selRows
field.purpose: specifies for which row points it is necessary to draw the ellipses

field.name: selCols
field.purpose: specifies for which column points it is necessary to draw the ellipses

field.name: AxesEllipse
field.purpose: boolean which specifies whether it is necessary to show the major axes of the ellipse

OutCovplot.purpose: structure requested as input by Covplot

field.name: S2cov
field.purpose: monitoring of the elements of the covariance matrix in each step of the forward search

field.name: Un
field.purpose: order of entry of each unit

field.name: Y
field.purpose: n x v data matrix

StandardCovplot.purpose: structure requested as optional input by covplot

field.name: SizeAxesNum
field.purpose: scalar specifying the fontsize of the axes numbers

field.name: xlim
field.purpose: two elements vector with minimum and maximum of the x axis

field.name: ylim
field.purpose: two elements vector with minimum and maximum of the y axis

field.name: titl
field.purpose: a label for the title

field.name: labx
field.purpose: a label for the x-axis

field.name: laby
field.purpose: a label for the y-axis

field.name: SizeAxesLab
field.purpose: Scalar specifying the fontsize of the labels of the axes

field.name: LineWidth
field.purpose: scalar specifying line width for the trajectories

field.name: Color
field.purpose: cell array of strings containing the colors to be used for the standard units

field.name: LineStyle
field.purpose: cell containing the line types

Fground.purpose: structure required as optional input by covplot and levfwdplot

field.name: fthresh
field.purpose: specifies the highlighted trajectories

field.name: funit
field.purpose: number of trajectories of the covariances to be highlighted

field.name: flabstep
field.purpose: specifies steps of the search where to put labels for the highlighted trajectories (units)

field.name: LineWidth
field.purpose: specifies line width for the highlighted trajectories

field.name: Color
field.purpose: colors to be used for the highlighted trajectories

field.name: LineStyle
field.purpose: line type of the highlighted trajectories

field.name: fmark
field.purpose: scalar controlling whether to plot highlighted trajectories as markers

FgroundMalfwdplot.purpose: structure required as optional input by malfwdplot and resfwdplot

field.name: fthresh
field.purpose: specifies the highlighted trajectories

field.name: funit
field.purpose: number of trajectories of the covariances to be highlighted

field.name: flabstep
field.purpose: specifies steps of the search where to put labels for the highlighted trajectories (units)

field.name: LineWidth
field.purpose: specifies line width for the highlighted trajectories

field.name: Color
field.purpose: colors to be used for the highlighted trajectories

field.name: LineStyle
field.purpose: line type of the highlighted trajectories

field.name: fmark
field.purpose: scalar controlling whether to plot highlighted trajectories as markers

field.name: FontSize
field.purpose: scalar controlling font size of the labels of the trajectories in foreground

Bground.purpose: structure requested as optional input by levfwdplot and malfwdplot

field.name: bthresh
field.purpose: specifies how to define the unimmportant trajectories

field.name: bstyle
field.purpose: specifies how to plot the unimportant trajectories as defined in option bthresh

outFanplot.purpose: structure requested as required input by fanplot

field.name: Score
field.purpose: Score

field.name: la
field.purpose: transformation parameter lambda which have been used inside routine FSRfan

field.name: bs
field.purpose: units forming the initial subset for each value of lambda

field.name: Un
field.purpose: unit(s) included in the subset at each step of the fwd search

field.name: y
field.purpose: vector containing the response

field.name: X
field.purpose: matrix containing the explanatory variables

outLevfwdplot.purpose: structure requested as required input by levfwdplot and malfwdplot

field.name: LEV
field.purpose: matrix containing the leverage monitored in each step of the forward search

field.name: RES
field.purpose: matrix containing the residuals monitored in each step of the forward search

field.name: Un
field.purpose: matrix containing the order of entry of each unit

field.name: y
field.purpose: vector containing the response

field.name: X
field.purpose: matrix containing the explanatory variables

field.name: Bols
field.purpose: estimated beta coefficients in each step of the forward search

StandardLevfwdplot.purpose: structure requested as optional input by Levfwdplot

field.name: SizeAxesNum
field.purpose: scalar specifying the fontsize of the axes numbers

field.name: xlim
field.purpose: two elements vector with minimum and maximum of the x axis

field.name: ylim
field.purpose: two elements vector with minimum and maximum of the y axis

field.name: titl
field.purpose: a label for the title

field.name: labx
field.purpose: a label for the x-axis

field.name: laby
field.purpose: a label for the y-axis

field.name: SizeAxesLab
field.purpose: Scalar specifying the fontsize of the labels of the axes

field.name: subsize
field.purpose: numeric vector containing the subset size with length equal to the number of columns of the leverage matrix

field.name: LineWidth
field.purpose: scalar specifying line width for the trajectories

field.name: Color
field.purpose: cell array of strings containing the colors to be used for the standard units

field.name: LineStyle
field.purpose: cell containing the line types

outMalfwdplot.purpose: structure used as required input by malfwdplot

field.name: MAL
field.purpose: matrix containing the squared Mahalanobis distances

field.name: Y
field.purpose: the original data matrix or another matrix with n rows and p variables

field.name: class
field.purpose: x and y axis labels

field.name: Un
field.purpose: order of entry of each unit

outMdrplot.purpose: structure requested as input by mrdplot

field.name: mdr
field.purpose: minimum deletion residual

field.name: Un
field.purpose: order of entry of each unit

field.name: y
field.purpose: vector containing the response

field.name: X
field.purpose: matrix containing the explanatory variables

field.name: Bols
field.purpose: Monitoring of beta coefficients

outMdrrsplot.purpose: structure requested as input by mdrrsplot

field.name: mdrrs
field.purpose: matrix containing the monitoring of minimum deletion residual

field.name: BBrs
field.purpose: array containing units forming subset for each random start

field.name: y
field.purpose: vector containing the response

field.name: X
field.purpose: matrix containing the explanatory variables

outMmdplot.purpose: structure requested as input by mmdplot

field.name: mmd
field.purpose: matrix containing the monitoring of miminum Mhahalanobis distance in each step of the forward search

field.name: Un
field.purpose: order of entry of each unit

field.name: Y
field.purpose: original n x v matrix

outMmdrsplot.purpose: structure requested as input by mmdrsplot

field.name: mmdrs
field.purpose: matrix containing the monitoring of minimum Mahalanobis distance

field.name: BBrs
field.purpose: array containing units forming subset for each random start

field.name: Y
field.purpose: matrix containing the original datamatrix

outResfwdplot.purpose: structure requested as input by resfwdplot

field.name: RES
field.purpose: matrix containing the residual monitored in each step of the forward search

field.name: Un
field.purpose: order of entry in the subset of each unit

field.name: y
field.purpose: vector containing the response

field.name: X
field.purpose: matrix containing the explanatory variables

field.name: Bols
field.purpose: Monitoring of estimated beta coefficients monitored in each step of the robus procedure

StandardResfwdplot.purpose: structure requested as optional input by resfwdplot

field.name: SizeAxesNum
field.purpose: scalar specifying the fontsize of the axes numbers

field.name: xlim
field.purpose: two elements vector with minimum and maximum of the x axis

field.name: ylim
field.purpose: two elements vector with minimum and maximum of the y axis

field.name: titl
field.purpose: a label for the title

field.name: labx
field.purpose: a label for the x-axis

field.name: laby
field.purpose: a label for the y-axis

field.name: SizeAxesLab
field.purpose: Scalar specifying the fontsize of the labels of the axes

field.name: xvalues
field.purpose: vector containing x axis values

field.name: LineWidth
field.purpose: scalar specifying line width for the trajectories

field.name: Color
field.purpose: cell array of strings containing the colors to be used for the highlighted units

field.name: LineStyle
field.purpose: cell containing the line types

inputs.name: out
inputs.purpose: Structure containing the output coming from ace procedure

inputs.name: highlight
inputs.purpose: Units to highliight in the plot

inputs.name: ylimy
inputs.purpose: 2D array of size 3-by-2 which specifies the lower and upper limits for the 3 plots of the second figure

aceplot.description: Produces the aceplot to visualize the results of ace

inputs.name: H
inputs.purpose: Handles to the lines on the graphs

inputs.name: AX
inputs.purpose: Handles to the axes of the individual plots

inputs.name: BigAx
inputs.purpose: Handle to big (invisible) axes framing the entire plot matrix

inputs.name: labeladd
inputs.purpose: Add labels for a group of units

inputs.name: RowNamesLabels
inputs.purpose: cell of length n, where n is the number of points in each scatter, containing the labels of the units

add2spm.description: Adds objects (personalized clickable multilegends and text labels) to the scatter plot matrix

inputs.name: H
inputs.purpose: Handles to the lines on the graphs

inputs.name: AX
inputs.purpose: Handles to the axes of the individual plots

inputs.name: BigAx
inputs.purpose: Handle to big (invisible) axes framing the entire plot matrix

add2yX.description: Adds objects (personalized clickable multilegends and text labels) to the yXplot

inputs.name: maxBestSol
inputs.purpose: maximum number of admissible solutions to show in the augmented star plot

avasmsplot.description: Produces the augmented star plot and enables interactivity

inputs.name: N
inputs.purpose: input contingency table (say of size I-by-J) or the original data matrix X

inputs.name: ax
inputs.purpose: displays the bubble chart in the target axes ax

outputs.name: Ntable
outputs.purpose: This is tha table which has been used to build the balloonplot

balloonplot.description: Creates a balloon plot of a contingency table

barVariableWidth.description: Produces a bar plot with different widths and colors for each bar

inputs.name: RelSol
inputs.purpose: Relevant solutions produced by function tclustICsol

inputs.name: minCarHeight
inputs.purpose: minimum height of the rectangles in the carbike plot

outputs.name: area
outputs.purpose: RelSol x 2 array reporting information on the relevance of the RelSol solutions

carbikeplot.description: produces the carbike plot to find best relevant clustering solutions

inputs.name: RelSol
inputs.purpose: Relevant solutions produced by function tclustICsolGPCM

carbikeplotGPCM.description: Produces the carbike plot to find best relevant clustering solutions

inputs.name: lablast
inputs.purpose: Label for the last unit entered

cdsplot.description: Produces the candlestick plot for robust model selection in linear regression

inputs.name: out
inputs.purpose: Structure containing the output of function CorAna

inputs.name: confellipse
inputs.purpose: confidence ellipses around rows and/or columns points

inputs.name: xlimx
inputs.purpose: Min and Max of the x axis

inputs.name: ylimy
inputs.purpose: Min and Max of the y axis

inputs.name: d1
inputs.purpose: Dimension to show on the horizontal axis

inputs.name: d2
inputs.purpose: Dimension to show on the vertical axis

inputs.name: h
inputs.purpose: the axis handle of a figure where to send the CorAnaplot

CorAnaplot.description: Draws the Correspondence Analysis (CA) graphs with confidence ellipses

covplot.description: Plots the trajectories of the elements of the covariance (correlation) matrix monitored

inputs.name: outCTL
inputs.purpose: output structure produced by function ctlcurves

inputs.name: thresh
inputs.purpose: threshold which defines where to put NaN in the out.pvalLRtest matrix

inputs.name: tagCtl
inputs.purpose: Personalized tag for CTL curves plot

ctlcurvesplot.description: Plots the output of routine ctlcurves

inputs.name: specs
inputs.purpose: the lower and upper limits of the shading area

inputs.name: userColor
inputs.purpose: The color of the shaded area

outputs.name: p
outputs.purpose: Probability covered by the shaded area

distribspec.description: Plots a probability density function between specification limits

inputs.name: highlight
inputs.purpose: units to highlight in the fanplot plot

inputs.name: SizeAxesNum
inputs.purpose: Size of the numbers of the axis

inputs.name: xlimx
inputs.purpose: Min and Max of the x axis

inputs.name: ylimy
inputs.purpose: Min and Max of the y axis

fanplot.description: Plots the fan plot for transformation in linear regression

inputs.name: y
inputs.purpose: vector of n elements to bin

inputs.name: ax
inputs.purpose: plots into ax instead of gca

outputs.name: ng
outputs.purpose: number of elements in each container for each group

histFS.description: Plots a histogram with the elements in each bin grouped according to a vector of labels

inputs.name: xground
inputs.purpose: trajectories to highlight in connection with resfwdplot

inputs.name: nameX
inputs.purpose: Labels of the variables of the regression dataset

levfwdplot.description: Plots the trajectories of leverage along the search

inputs.purpose: Structure containing monitoring of Mahalanobis distance

inputs.name: bground
inputs.purpose: characterictics of the trajectories in background

inputs.name: conflev
inputs.purpose: confidence interval for the horizontal bands

malfwdplot.description: Plots the trajectories of scaled Mahalanobis distances along the search

inputs.name: v
inputs.purpose: Number of variables or matrix of size n-by-k containing empirical envelope

inputs.name: modelT
inputs.purpose: controls how the consistency factor is applied to account for the effect of trimming

inputs.name: numlab
inputs.purpose: number of points to be labelled in the plot

inputs.name: conflev
inputs.purpose: confidence interval for the horizontal bands

inputs.name: nameY
inputs.purpose: variables labels of the original data matrix

inputs.name: quant
inputs.purpose: Quantiles for which envelope have to be computed

inputs.name: xlimx

inputs.name: ylimy
inputs.purpose: minimum and maximum on the y axis

inputs.name: nameX
inputs.purpose: Labels of the variables of the regression dataset
